subject: CS
title: Introduction to the Theory of Computing
description: Models of computers including finite automata and Turing machines. Basics of formal languages with applications to the syntax of programming languages. Alternate characterizations of language classes. Proving unrecognizability.  Unsolvable problems and their relevance to the semantics of programming. [Note: Enrolment is restricted; see Note 1 above. Offered: F,W,S]
